name: Spinach and Cauliflower Bhaji
author: Remsha
summary: This dish is half Indian and half Pakistani. This excellent vegetable dish goes well with most Asian foods and it is simple and quick-cooking. Serve hot with roti breads, if wished.
ingredients: 1 (1 inch) piece fresh ginger, peeled and chopped
salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 pound fresh spinach, chopped and stems removed
directions: Heat vegetable oil in a large saucepan over medium heat; cook and stir onions and cauliflower until slightly softened, about 3 minutes
Add garlic, ginger, coriander, cumin, turmeric, and cayenne pepper; stir to coat
Stir tomatoes and vegetable broth into cauliflower mixture; season with salt and black pepper
Bring mixture to a boil, cover, and reduce heat
Simmer until flavors have blended, about 8 minutes
Stir spinach into mixture until it begins to wilt
Cover and simmer until spinach is completely wilted and cauliflower is tender, 8 to 10 minutes
